782:2: 1 | adhigatadhyānasamāpatta raikāgracittasya viviktaṃ bhavati cittaṃ pariśuddhā ca bhavati prajñā |
782:3: yathā nivātastho dīpo bhāsvaro bhavati pariśuddhaśca ||
782:17: 3 | śūnye pravivikte pradeśe niṣadyāyāṃ vā sthāne vā śayane vā gamane vā caṃkramaṇe vā samāhitena manasā tīkṣṇayā prajñayā gaṃbhīrā śraddhā (janayitavyā)|
782:21: vivicya kāmairvivicyākuśaladharmaiḥ savicāraṃ savitarkaṃ kāmavivekajaṃ pratīsukhaṃ prāpnotītyucyate prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ ||
782:22: bahirdhāyataneṣvāsaṃgaḥ tathāhi kāmachando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā |
782:32: etaiḥ prathamadhyānasya paṃcāṃgairvivikto bhavati rāgo mahāduḥkhaḥ pāpo'
782:58: kṣapayitvā vitarkavicāramalaṃ kṣapayitvā puṇyavāsanāṃ sa eṣa mārgo dvitīyadhyānonmukhaḥ ||
782:59: 5 | prītyā virāgād upekṣako viharati pratisaṃvedayati kāyena sukhaṃ bhavatyanāsravaḥ pudgalaḥ sa ucyate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamavatīrṇaḥ |
782:67: paśyan prītimakuśalāṃ niṣprītikaṃ sukhaṃ sākṣātkurvan dhyāyati |
782:69: sukhamupekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajñānaṃ samādhiśceti paṃcāṃgāni bhavanti yathoktapūrvāṇi |
782:71: 6 | sukhasya prahāṇāt pūrvameva duḥkhasya prahāṇāt saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhamupasaṃpādayati caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ |
782:73: api ca paśyan sukhaduḥkhadopamaduḥkhāsukho bhavati supratiṣṭhitaḥ |
782:84: catvāri dhyānāni trividhāni sāsvādāni saṃprasādanāni anāsravāṇi ca |
782:86: 8 | rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt paśyatyanantamavakāśamityākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattimavatarati ākāśānantyāyatanasupratiṣṭhitaḥ sākṣātkurvannimaṃ mārgamupasaṃpādayati ākāśānantyātanasamādhiṃ |
782:87: anantaṃ vijñānamiti bhāvayan vijñānānantyāyatanamavatīrya paśyannākāśānantyāyatanadoṣaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanasupratiṣṭhitaḥ sākṣātkurvannimaṃ mārgamupasaṃpādayati vijñānānantyāyatanasamādhiṃ |
782:89: saṃjñāyatanaṃ roga iti asaṃjñāyatanaṃ moha ityevaṃ bhāvayan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattimavatīrya paśyannākiṃcanyāyatanadoṣaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasupratiṣṭhitaḥ sākṣātkurvannimaṃ mārgamupasaṃpādayati naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamādhimiti naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatana dhyānaṃ ||
782:94: samāhitaḥ saṃkhyātyānāpānaṃ ekaṃ dve yāvat daśa kṣaṇān ānāpānapraveśanirgamamavaṣṭabhya yathā dvārapālakaḥ paśyati sarvadharmā udayavyayā iti |
782:96: paśyati kāyaḥ anityaḥ duḥkhaḥ śūnyaḥ anātmakaḥ - iti paśyannevaṃ sarvadharmān lokasaṃtrastaḥ paryāyeṇa prahāya malaṃ bhāvayan kuśaladharmān nirvāṇābhimukho bhavati ||
782:97: 10 | asamāpattidhyānabhūmiḥ madhyamadhyānabhūmiḥ caturdhyānabhūmayaḥ tisra ārūpyadhyānabhūmayaśceti dvividhāḥ |
782:104: sukha aśuci maraṇa prahāṇa virāga nirodhasaṃjñā ||
782:120: bhāvayati paṃcopādānaskaṃdhānāmapunarbhave nirodhe sthāpane saṃparityāge nirvāṇamiti nirodhasaṃjñā |
782:121: etā daśa saṃjñā nityaṃ bhāvayatā bhavati duḥkhanirodhaprāptiḥ ||
